title: Wipeout XL [Direct Play]
description:
Wipeout XL a.k.a. Wipeout 2097 [Direct Play]

Wipeout is the title of a series of futuristic anti-gravity racing games, 
originally produced by Psygnosis for the PlayStation video game console. 
Wipeout XL is the second game in the Wipeout series to be released. It moved 
the Wipeout brand forward, introducing new tracks, new craft, and new weapons 
such as the Quake Disruptor (which sent a ripple down the track) that became 
instant fan favorites. Just as in the original game, players must race 
across crazy tracks while driving hovercraft from the future. On top of the 
racing action, players need to collect weapons in order to take down their 
closet competitors. To cater for the increase in Wipeout players, an easier 
learning curve was introduced whilst keeping the difficulty at top end for 
the experienced gamers.


Features:

- Race against up to 12 ships on 6 tracks (Plus two hidden ones!) 
- 11 hi-tech weapons to pick up and unleash onto your rivals
- Two additional racing classes

Supported OS: Windows 95/98/ME/2K/XP/Vista

Genre: Sports/Arcade/Racing

Developer: Psygnosis Limited 

Release Date: May 1997

Ripped: Intro Movies and CD Audio

Extras: I&#039;ve added the Soundtrack from the PlayStation and the PC version 
(Music Directory) so you can play it with the original music. The best way 
is to burn them on an Audio CD and play it with your favorite Media Player 
before you start the game.

Install: Unzip to any location & run RegSetup.exe, it adds the needed info 
to the registry and creates a shortcut on the Desktop.


ADHDerby
